statements: DELETE FROM authentication_activity WHERE id = 10 AND username = 'user1'
DELETE FROM authentication_attempts WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND success = FALSE;
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND timestamp > '2022-02-28';
DELETE FROM authentication_attempts WHERE user_id = 101 AND success = FALSE;
DELETE FROM authentication_attempts WHERE attempt_id = 5 AND user_id = 10;
DELETE FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND password_hash = 'hashedpasword123';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE activity_description = 'Logout' AND activity_timestamp > '2021-06-30';
DELETE FROM login_history WHERE user_id = 10 AND login_time < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
